name.$comment: the name of the enum, lowercase and underscore-delimited

package.$comment: single-word package name for this enum

group.$comment: when set, places this enum inside a folder group

icon.$comment: one of the SVGs available in ./assets

values.$comment: the possible values of this enum's members

tags.$comment: simple flags for this model; unused

proper.$comment: overrides the computed proper-case version of the name

config.$comment: a config object for this enum; unused
